title: IEdgeFlangeFeatureData.NormalToFlangePlane
description: Gets or sets whether the Up To Vertex is on a plane that is normal to the end face of this edge flange.
returns: True if the Up To Vertex is on a plane that is normal to the end face of the edge flange (default), false if the Up To Vertex passes through a plane that is parallel to the face of the base flange
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IEdgeFlangeFeatureData::OffsetType
is set to
swFlangeOffsetTypes_e
.swFlangeOffsetUpToVertex.
